attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The published speed limits should be enforced nationally acoss the entire road network. Publishing the location of speed cameras simply enables people (particularly those familiar with the road) to slow to the speed limit at those points and break the limit elsewhere. If the stretch of road is dangerous, put up an "Accident Blackspot" warning sign. The speed limit is the speed limit....everywhere.
